body_html:
Since I am the author of the PR, it wont let me approve.
I will add set -x and set -e to the bash piece.

On Thu, Nov 3, 2016 at 4:36 PM, Yun Peng notifications@github.com wrote:

@gunan https://github.com/gunan Probably yes, it's better we still have
it for now.
I can only confirm we don't need it when job name is as short as
tensorflow
Setting set -e sounds good to me, just add it in the beginning of the
script, it should be the same as linux.

Why can't you approve this? What else need to be done?

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
#5385 (comment),
or mute the thread
https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AHlCOf6Mw94f67kpaGRxRrNzSx7Q6mnAks5q6m_igaJpZM4KouOm

body:
Since I am the author of the PR, it wont let me approve.
I will add set -x and set -e to the bash piece.

On Thu, Nov 3, 2016 at 4:36 PM, Yun Peng notifications@github.com wrote:

> @gunan https://github.com/gunan Probably yes, it's better we still have
> it for now.
> I can only confirm we don't need it when job name is as short as
> tensorflow
> Setting set -e sounds good to me, just add it in the beginning of the
> script, it should be the same as linux.
> 
> Why can't you approve this? What else need to be done?
> 
> —
